Class DriveEncoder

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.templates.DriveEncoder

  • public class DriveEncoder
extends Object
    Author:
    Rohan Doshi This class utilizes shaft encoders to allow the robot to go an exact distance during the autonomous period.
